name: Prototype Grudge

refinement_effect.refine_one: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_two: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_three: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_four: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 14% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_five: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 16% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

description: A grudge discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.
